records.Name: Textured Satchel Bag
records.Description: Crafted from high-quality materials with a unique textured finish, it features a structured shape, a spacious interior, and sturdy handles. With a detachable shoulder strap for versatility, this satchel adds a chic touch to any outfit while offering practicality for everyday use.

records.Name: Handmade Tote Bag
records.Description: Made from durable, high-quality materials, it offers ample space for daily essentials. With its sturdy handles and chic design, this tote is perfect for both casual outings and more polished looks.

records.Name: Glitter Bodycon
records.Description: Made from a blend of polyester and spandex, ensuring stretch for a comfortable fit and a sleek finish. A scoop neck, high neck, or sweetheart neckline for added allure. The perfect party wear dress.

records.Name: Fleece Jacket
records.Description: Featuring a zip-up front, cozy pockets, and a relaxed fit, itâ€™s a versatile piece for outdoor activities or casual everyday wear. Runs a size smaller.

records.Name: Windcheater Puffer Jacket
records.Description: Designed for ultimate warmth, it features a quilted, lightweight design, water-resistant fabric, and a snug hood. Perfect for temperatures -10 degrees celcius to 5 degrees celcius.

records.Name: Sequined Maxi Dress
records.Description: Full-length maxi silhouette that creates a graceful and elongated look. Made from polyester mesh with all-over sequins, providing a sparkling, high-quality finish. Fully lined with soft satin or polyester fabric for comfort and smooth wear. Ideal for parties

records.Name: Vintage Printed Long Dress
records.Description: A floor-length silhouette crafted from 100% rayon or cotton blend with Smooth, wrinkle-resistant finish

records.Name: Floral Dress
records.Description: Intricate floral prints in vibrant tones made with a blend of cotton and linen.

records.Name: Sleeveless Neck Top and Skirt
records.Description: A sleek sleeveless design with a flattering round neckline. Made with 100% polyester, offering a lightweight, wrinkle-resistant fabric with a smooth finish.

records.Name: Full Sleeve Long Line Overcoat
records.Description: Full-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs for added elegance and warmth. Made from 65% wool and 35% polyester, offering a perfect balance of warmth, durability, and a soft texture.

records.Name: Printed Clutch
records.Description: A stylish leather clutch made with brass handles and a woolen strap
